value.stringValue:
[Opportunity].Record_Type_Name__c = 'Fleet Card'
&&
$User.CPQ_User__c = true
&&
[Opportunity].Pricebook_Assignment__c <>'N/A'
&&
NOT(ISBLANK([Opportunity].Offer__c))
&&
NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].Offer__c.Price_Book__c)))
&&
OR(
ISNEW() && NOT(ISBLANK([Opportunity].Offer__c)) , ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Offer__c), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Record_Type_Name__c)
)

formulas.expression:
{!myVariable_old.Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Fleet Card'
&&
{!$User.CPQ_User__c} = true
&&
{!myVariable_old.Pricebook_Assignment__c} <>'N/A'
&&
NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_old.Offer__c}))
&&
NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_old.Offer__r.Price_Book__c})))
&&
OR(
ISNEW() && NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_old.Offer__c})) , ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.Offer__c}), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.Record_Type_Name__c})
)
